g.text: Decision Tree only shows the probability and possible events
But we may have biases on
1. base-rate (do not know the fact and we are Heuristic)
2. simple-size (if the sample size is not enough then the result may far
3. Regression to mean (some extreme case should not be our decision factor)
4. Events always (most of the times) are independent
5. Adaptive learning, we may learns sth from good and always think bad are always bad
1. Only falsification will lead to conclusive understanding
2. Confirmation (verification) always leads to ambiguous understanding
3. Truth cannot be proven and cannot be rejected
Problem or discussion always has bias in people mind
1. illusion on graph may make a wrong decision
